Name: Blue Fish Yokohama
About the game: Blue Fish Yokohama is a relaxing tile-based puzzle game where all the ramen is deliciously eaten by our protagonist... a fish!?!!?!?!! What's on the menu? 1. Cheese ramen is sticky and fat so you don't jump so far. 2. Miso ramen has that umami boost. 3. Spicy hot tantanmen will blow you away. 4. Mizu Yokan is your bouncy dessert. Game Features + Simple controls that you will pick up instantly + Discover new and exciting game mechanics as the levels progress. + Solve & explore 50 handcrafted levels in beautiful and colorful voxel art. Eat the ramen, save the world. You'll receive the full game with the 50 levels plus loads of karma points for supporting independent & small-scale developers.
